Music learning is all about practice. At eRiyaz we have a variety of apps to give you immediate feedback on your singing. The experience is like a most accomplished guru watching over you during all of your practices right at your home.
But that is not to say you will be alone in your journey to becoming a great singer. When you join our course, you will be assigned a mentor to guide you through the exercises, clear doubts and provide motivation, and cover other aspects which cannot be covered by a software. The course fee is Rs 999 per month. You will have weekly two online sessions with mentor.
